surveys.title: Q1: Feel valued in your job at the moment
surveys.answerColumn: To what extent you feel valued in your job at the moment?

surveys.title: Q2: Confidence in career planning
surveys.answerColumn: How confident do you feel about your career planning?

surveys.title: Q3: Job Description & Day-to-day Work
surveys.answerColumn: To what extent does the information provided during your job interview align with your day-to-day work?
